resources.string: The question isn\'t who is going to let me; it\'s who is going to stop me.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
It\'s when we start working together that the real healing takes place.
Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity. – Hippocrates.
Awareness is the first step in healing.
And sometimes, against all odds, against all logic, we still hope.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Do what you love, and you’ll never work another day in your life.
Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it. - Helen Keller
I am not what happened to me. I am what I choose to become. — Carl Jung
The best way out is always through. – Robert Frost
Healing is the end of conflict of yourself. – Stephanie Gailing
We are healed of a suffering only by experiencing it to the full. — Marcel Proust
Part of the healing process is sharing with other people who care.
